DataElement.preferredName: Tumor Segment Image ID Examined by Pathologist Aperio Format Identifier
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The image identifier in the Aperio format of the tumor segment examined by the pathologist.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tumor Segment Image ID Examined by Pathologist
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis._The identifier for an image that has been examined by a pathologist.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Concepts.definition: Sufficient total material from each patient, divided to yield a minimum of one aliquot, preferably divided into three to five aliquots, of specified cancer tissue suitable for processing for proteomic and genomic analysis.

Property.preferredDefinition: The identifier for an image that has been examined by a pathologist.

Concepts.definition: The identifier for an image that has been examined by a pathologist.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Any specific activity undertaken during the course of a clinical study or research protocol.

DataElementConcept.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set. 1/6/20 jk created for CPTAC Path Review CRF.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A data storage format consisting of a single-file pyramidal tiled TIFF, with non-standard metadata and compression format._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ValueDomain.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set. 1/6/20 jk created for CPTAC Path Review CRF; applicable to all tumor types.

DataElement.origin: CPTAC: Clinical Proteomic Tumor Analysis Consortium
DataElement.changeDescription: 8/17/21 jk added CM Path Rpt CSI.  7/12/21 jk added HNSCC Path Rpt CSI. 4/30/20 jk added CPTAC LGG Path CSI.  1/22/20 jk released per CPTAC SME's review of PRAD Path Review CDE set. 1/7/20 jk created for CPTAC Path Review CRFs; applicable to all tumor types.
